description: Monitor for unusual Serverless function modifications, such as adding roles to a function that allow unauthorized access or execution. Analytic 1 - Tracks actions related to creating or modifying serverless functions index=cloud_logs sourcetype=aws:iam OR sourcetype=azure:activity OR sourcetype=gcp:iam | search action IN ("iam:PassRole", "iam:CreateFunction", "iam:AddPermission", "iam:UpdateFunctionConfiguration")
